channel.title: [PI] Costume Items [PI]
channel.description:
hey i have a question about Pi costume items,
oke here we go. First of al i want to add costume items to my Pi i did this alot on my delta's and my question is is Pi the same as delta. like get the models out of the raw folder and them put it in ur cache raw folder. and then add it to itemdef2 ?
and then go in game and do ::addmodels
and then add it to item.cfg and item.java
if it is difrend plz tell cuz i wanna make sure before i go do all this :p if not plz tell me how :)

item.title: [PI] Costume Items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

X Entinity X:

You put them in raw and then in itemdef2 or itemdef.java.

thx dude i go try it out
whats the difrend between itemdef2 or itemdef.java ??
and itemdef2 or itemdef.java are like itemhandler in delta rite?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Costume Items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

You put them in raw and then in itemdef2 or itemdef.java.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Costume Items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

X Entinity X:

PI is different, different models and you don’t need to do addmodel.

plz tell me how then ??

Read full topic

@X_Entinity_X wrote:

PI is different, different models and you don’t need to do addmodel.
